content:
I got tired of deployment platforms that cost more than my coffee budget and use enough RAM to run a small country. Dockrune is my rebellion against the cloud industrial complex—a single binary that watches your GitHub repo and deploys changes to your VPS when you push to main.

No dashboards, no configuration files, no monthly fees for features you'll never use. Just git push and your code runs somewhere. It's what deployment should have been all along: boring, reliable, and cheap enough that you can afford to experiment.
